section.title: Manage images
section.para: During setup of OpenStack cloud, the cloud operator sets user permissions to manage images.
Image upload and management might be restricted to cloud administrators or cloud operators only.
After you upload an image, it is considered golden and cannot be changed.
Though you can complete most tasks with the OpenStack dashboard or from the command line, you can upload images only through the glance client or the Image Service API.
